value:
$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Damn it... If we do nothing— Gah!$k$p$EFace_Cool|Come, Summoner! We cannot afford
to let you go, you understand!$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Stop where you are, Ótr!$k$p$SspSE_BATTLE_STING1|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$w0|$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...N-Nótt? What are you—$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Cool|So surprised to see me, dearest?
...You will regret leading me along.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Over here! I've got Breidablik!$k$p$EFace|$Nu! I got this
back for you!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Over here, $Nu!$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Cool|No! The summoner stays with me!$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Cool|It's enough to make a jötun
jealous! Taking your attention
off me is a mistake! Hyaah!$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Urrgh! ...Such strength! You jötun
women are all muscle, no sense!$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Looks like he needs another, Nótt!
Get him!$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$w0|$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Pain|N-nyah! ...Huh?$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Enough self-indulgence, Ótr.
It's time...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_闇ディミトリ,ch17_03_Dimitri_M_Dark04,Face|All that remains of me is my hate.
If I could tear her to shreds right
here and now, I would...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_MNS_FE16_12,0|$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$w0|$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Gyaaahh!$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face_Smile2|You have no hope of challenging me.
I created Gullinbursti and the sword,
Reginn. What hope do you have?$k$p$EFace|Come, Ótr.$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Cool|What about the summoner?!$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face_Anger|I have no intention of committing
suicide with you here. We'll give up
the summoner and retreat for now.$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Cool|Retreat? What about Járngreipr?$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Don't worry. You still have the
sword Gramr, correct?$k$pAnd we'll be able to find them easily
enough. This sort won't abide Fáfnir's
brutal tactics.$k$p$EFace_Smile2|All we need do is attack another
country, and they'll come running.
Every time.$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face|...You have a point. Then we have
an excuse to exercise our cruelty!
We can kill and conquer at whim!$k$p$EFace_Smile|Let's return to the castle and make
our preparations. Heh... Wait until
you hear this, Brother!$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$Nu!$k$pAre you injured?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I'm so glad to see you in one piece!$k$p$EFace_Smile|I don't know what we'd do without
you around!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Blush2|I... I was so worried! I'm sorry,
$Nu!$k$p$EFace_Cry|*sniff*$k$pPlease forgive me!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|A-all right, that's enough, everyone!$k$p$EFace|That said, it is good to have you
back, $Nu.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|So, why did they abduct you anyway?$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|Járngreipr... So that's what Ótr's
after. A weapon to destroy gates...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|If they're successful, that'll be
trouble for Askr!$k$pWe won't be able to summon any
Heroes, and the ones here won't
be able to return home, right?!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What could he want with—$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Is Ótr so intent on defeating Askr?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Hmm... I'm not sure it has anything
to do with Askr.$k$pYou could summon all the Heroes
there are, and you'd still fall to
Niðavellir's seiðjárn in the end.$k$pHe must want Járngreipr for some
other reason...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|That doesn't make me feel
much better...$k$p$EFace_Cool2|But if that's true, what could Ótr
be after?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|*sigh* We don't have enough
information to make an informed
assessment just yet.$k$p$EFace|But even if we lost Gramr, it's good
to have $Nu back.$k$pRight, Alfonse?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Indeed, Commander. I'm so glad
you're safe, $Nu.$k$pWithout you, I don't know how
I could live on...$k$p$EFace|...What's so funny, Sharena?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|H-huh? Oh! N-nothing! Please just...
ignore me! I'm fine!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|...You must be exhausted. Let's take
the rest of the day for rest.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Attention, everyone! Something
terrible has happened!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Peony! What is it?!$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Fáfnir is attacking Askr! I came to
call you back!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|What?! No... Mother!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|We've got to get back! Let's go!
Stay safe, Mother...$k$p$Sbs150|
